title: The Creature and the Queen
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 1,767 words, Level W (Grade 4), Lexile 890L, Fiction Series
description: The Creature and the Queen continues the Hollow Kids adventures with Qynn and Odie learning more about the new world from a strange creature named Seth. What mysteries will Seth solve? This book can also be used to teach students to identify cause-and effect-relationships as well as the proper use of ellipses.
highFrequencyWords: abscond, begrudge, commenced, domicile, eloquent, embellishment, empathetic, frolicked, impudence, plight, reconnaissance, succumb
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
awareness: Prefixes : Recognize and use the prefix re-
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
